name: Barbarian
description: A fierce warrior of primitive background who can enter a battle rage.
hp_at_higher_levels: 1d12 (or 7) + your Constitution modifier per Barbarian level after 1st

1.name: Rage
1.description: Enter a 1-minute rage as a bonus action for advantage on Strength checks and saves, +2 melee damage with Strength, and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging and you have a limited number of rages per long rest.

1.name: Unarmored Defense
1.description: While not wearing armor, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

2.name: Danger Sense
2.description: You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects you can see, such as traps and spells, unless you are blinded, deafened, or incapacitated.

2.name: Reckless Attack
2.description: When you make your first attack on a turn, you can gain advantage on melee weapon attacks using Strength, but attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn.

3.name: Primal Path
3.description: Choose a path that shapes the nature of your rage. It grants features at 3rd, 6th, 10th, and 14th levels.

3.name: Primal Knowledge
3.description: (Optional) Gain proficiency in one skill from the barbarian skill list. You gain this feature again at 10th level.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

5.name: Fast Movement
5.description: Your speed increases by 10 feet while you aren't wearing heavy armor.

6.name: Path Feature
6.description: You gain a feature from your chosen Primal Path.

7.name: Feral Instinct
7.description: You have advantage on initiative rolls. If surprised, you can act on your first turn if you enter your rage before doing anything else.

7.name: Instinctive Pounce
7.description: (Optional) When you enter your rage, you can move up to half your speed as part of the bonus action.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

9.name: Brutal Critical (1 die)
9.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee attack, roll one additional weapon damage die when determining the extra damage.

10.name: Path Feature
10.description: You gain a feature from your chosen Primal Path.

10.name: Primal Knowledge
10.description: (Optional) Gain proficiency in one skill from the barbarian skill list.

11.name: Relentless Rage
11.description: If you drop to 0 hit points while raging and don't die outright, you can make a DC 10 Constitution save to drop to 1 hit point instead. The DC increases by 5 each time you use this feature until a rest.

12.name: Ability Score Improvement
12.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

13.name: Brutal Critical (2 dice)
13.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee attack, roll two additional weapon damage dice when determining the extra damage.

14.name: Path Feature
14.description: You gain a feature from your chosen Primal Path.

15.name: Persistent Rage
15.description: Your rage ends early only if you fall unconscious or if you choose to end it.

16.name: Ability Score Improvement
16.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

17.name: Brutal Critical (3 dice)
17.description: When you score a critical hit with a melee attack, roll three additional weapon damage dice when determining the extra damage.

18.name: Indomitable Might
18.description: If your total for a Strength check is less than your Strength score, you can use that score instead.

19.name: Ability Score Improvement
19.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two scores by 1. You may instead take a feat if allowed.

20.name: Primal Champion
20.description: Your Strength and Constitution scores increase by 4, and their maximums become 24.
